mapper.select: SELECT a.data_name, a.id as data_id, a.businessid as business_id, b.business_name from tb_area_data a left join tb_area_business b on a.businessid = b.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.*, b.business_name, c.data_name FROM tb_project_dimension a left join tb_area_business b on a.business_id=b.id left join tb_area_data c on a.data_id = c.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.id= ${id}
